main event: A witness reported seeing two bright white spherical objects moving rapidly in a cloudy sky on June 22, 1964.
interesting points: The witness observed the objects moving erratically and at a high rate of speed across the sky., The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds., The weather conditions were mostly clear with scattered clouds., Two photographs were submitted showing a cloudy sky with dark spots, but they do not provide clear evidence of UFOs., The witness was a telephone lineman, adding credibility to their observation.
